posts.Name: PlusTXT
posts.Text:
·Allows you to text in 8 different Indian languages
·Typing done through transliteration

posts.Name: Skyro (formerly Sky Recorder)
posts.Text:
·Beautifully designed voice recorder app
·Allows you to sync all your recordings to Dropbox
·Upload and share them via Soundcloud as well as
·Search through them with tags, locations and dates.

posts.Name: Paperboy
posts.Text:
·Search for non·pro users
·Great Visuals
·Highly customizable
·Love the magazine mode

posts.Name: India Against Spam
posts.Text:
·Quickly send complaints to TRAI for spam calls/texts
·OK·ish UI
·It works

·Clean design
·No ads
·Google Play Games integration
·Developed by a schoolboy

posts.Name: Dialapp
posts.Text:
·Attractive UI not to dissimilar from KitKat dialer
·Themes
·Great experience when it works well

posts.Name: Perfect My English
posts.Text:
· Quick fix for common grammatical mistakes
· Focus on tests instead of theory

posts.Name: Low Price
posts.Text:
· Finds you the cheapest website to find a book
· Search by title or barcode
· Polished design
